whatIsNFT.title: what is an NFT?
whatIsNFT.description: Non-Fungible Tokens are the digital equivalent of owning cool things in the physical world, like sexy sneakers or a Van Gogh. Like them, NFTs are unique, non-interchangeable units of data stored on the blockchain. They are photos, videos, or audio. They provide public proof of authenticity or ownership. But that does not restrict the sharing or copying of the digital file. Welcome to the future of owning, flaunting and sharing things on the net!

valueProps.title: the value props
valueProps.description: AssetMantle is a one-of-a-kind platform to facilitate commerce for your NFTs.

list.title: fast and Cost-Effective
list.body: Asset Mantle reduces time and cost to mind and set up a store with plug and play tech and low minting and transaction fees.

list.title: Creative freedom
list.body: Create and buy any kind of NFT from our wide range. Plus it’s all seamlessly interoperable with any platform/chain.

list.title: Customize and conquer
list.body: Get complete customization with our plug and play tech, and build your visibility with our public listings.

list.title: Leverage a strong community
list.body: We’re not just an NFT marketplace. You can tap into a vibrant community of experts, influencers, and like-minded NFT geeks.

realWorldAssets.title: what are real world asset NFTS?
realWorldAssets.description: A real world asset NFT is a token that authorizes the bearer as the virtual owner of a physical good. It’s also called rwANFt.
list: NFTs in real estate can increase speed and cost-efficiency where they would otherwise be many stakeholders and processes.
Programmable art that uniquely combines creatvity and technology can lead to many limited edition artwork pieces.
Smart contract tech helps musicians transfer copyrights to NFTs, ensuring they receive royalties whenever their music is played.
In gaming ecosystems, players can unlock specific in-game products that can be traded in-game or sold for real-world money.
Collectible NFTs are one-of-a-kind digital kittens that users may breed to produce even more one-of-a-kind kittens.

USDSpent.title: total USD spent on NFTs
USDSpent.description: NFTs are growing in popularity. Sales amounted to more than 2.4$ Bn in the first 6 months of 2021. People are spending thousands on digital assets because 1) they believe in the tech and see long-term value, and 2) owning NFTs creates social status in the crypto community like a Rolex or a Lamborghini does in real life.

communityGuidelines.title: Community guidelines
communityGuidelines.description: Our rigorous, vibrant community ensures that convenience, safety, and privacy are always important for creators and collectors.

options.title: Guideline 1
options.body: AssetMantle will have curators and moderators who will screen the NFTs for inappropriate content

options.title: Guideline 2
options.body: No restrictions on the kind of content created but everything will be screened
